title: Episode #41: Mindsets for Success Part 3: The Controlled Emotions, Forgiveness, and Happiness Mindsets
description:
A mindset is an attitude, or a cluster of thoughts with attached information and emotions that generate a particular perception. They shape how you see and interact with the world. They can catapult you forward, allowing you to achieve dreams, or put you in reverse drive if you are not careful.
In this episode I continue the discussion on mindsets for success from my new book THINK LEARN SUCCEED, specifically focusing on the controlled emotions, forgiveness, and happiness mindsets.
For more infomation on mindsets and to pre-order my new book THINK LEARN SUCEED click here: https://thinklearnsucceedbook.com
dc:creator: Dr. Caroline Leaf
